entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 06:57 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -37.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
